feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 9:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow this evening then to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 7:27 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:27 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with drizzle early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 7:27 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 7:27 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 7:27 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
